授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to help doctoral
candidates develop their academic writing skills prior to the submission of
their theses.
到達目標:
Students write their theses for submission by the
faculty deadline, making individual appointments to discuss their drafts as
required. These are not simply opportunities to have your work checked by a
native speaker but an essential part of the learning process. Above all, it is
hoped that students will learn to avoid basic errors and develop a sound
academic style of their own.
授業方法:
Students submit each chapter of their work when
ready for correction, and meet by appointment for advice on rewriting and
development.

トピック.授業計画1: Contact during the autumn semester is mainly by email.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to submit their complete thesis by a date agreed early in the semester (but no less than four weeks before the official date of submission).
